channel.title: Talon CAB bus IoT Mirage pinout?
channel.description:
Hi all! For some months I have been developing a project that involves the use of the CAN IoT Talon Mirage module. I want to deepen this project, but I have a problem: on the site it is not a pinout, a difference instead available of the WiFi talon card like thus: ![image|226x500](upload://oPDvKFYpFHOHBxWr7aP5ce7zPRj.png) Does anyone know where I can get it also for the CAN module?
[image]
Unfortunately the only thing I could find is this slide
https://www.taloncom.com/images/Talon%20mangOH%20CAN%20Bus%20Module%20Brief%202018.pdf
Any help will be appreciated. Thanks to anyone who will answer me.

item.title: Talon CAB bus IoT Mirage pinout?
item.dc:creator: gavinoimparato1
item.description:
Hi all!
For some months I have been developing a project that involves the use of the CAN IoT Talon Mirage module. I want to deepen this project, but I have a problem: on the site it is not a pinout, a difference instead available of the WiFi talon card like thus:


Does anyone know where I can get it also for the CAN module?

[image]

Unfortunately the only thing I could find is this slide

taloncom.com

Talon%20mangOH%20CAN%20Bus%20Module%20Brief%202018.pdf

451.44 KB

Any help will be appreciated. Thanks to anyone who will answer me.
